description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.
name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api

description: The Ultimate Weather Forecast API delivers up to 14 days of precise weather predictions and alerts in JSON format. It uniquely includes astronomy data, daily forecasts, and detailed hourly weather information for any city. With flexible query parameters including latitude/longitude, city names, and postal codes, this API ensures accurate and comprehensive weather insights tailored to your needs.
name: ultimate_weather_forecast_api
